Values.CosmosDbConnectionString: <connection string for Cosmos DB local emulator or development Cosmos DB instance>
Values.AzureAdAudience: <the Application ID URI from Azure AD, ex: api://feff4b9c-2a58-4a8f-b729-1164b0bdff37>
Values.AzureAdClientId: <client ID of your Azure AD application ex: feff4b9c-2a58-4a8f-b729-1164b0bdff37>
Values.AzureAdTenant: <domain of your Azure AD tenant, ex: contoso.com>
Values.AzureAdTenantId: <ID of yhour Azure AD tneant, ex: 6c8a9780-aaa0-4d71-8fac-99af8954737e>
